tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ad_performance_data (
  ad_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  channel TEXT,
  impressions INT,
  clicks INT,
  conversions INT
)

CREATE TABLE ad_performance_data (
    ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    channel VARCHAR(50),
    clicks INT,
    impressions INT,
    spend DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE ad_campaign (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    channel VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE ad_performance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT,
    cost DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES ad_campaign(campaign_id)
);

CREATE TABLE channel_allocation (
    allocation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    channel VARCHAR(50),
    budget DECIMAL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE AdPerformance (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_id INT NOT NULL,
    impressions INT NOT NULL,
    clicks INT NOT NULL,
    conversions INT NOT NULL,
    spend DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE ChannelMetrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    channel VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    impressions INT NOT NULL,
    clicks INT NOT NULL,
    conversions INT NOT NULL,
    spend DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL
);
